resources.string: Welcome to Strongbird! This app will help you keep track of your stronglifts workout.
Hello! To start logging, use the checkboxes for the exercises, e.g. if you finished your squats for the day, make sure all five are checked before you press finish.
Are you sure you wish to log this workout?
Choose which unit of measurement to display weight in
Resets user data. This can not be undone!
Are you sure you want to reset your data?
Change weight and number of sets for the squat exercise
Change weight and number of sets for the bench press exercise
Change weight and number of sets for the rowing exercise
Change weight and number of sets for the deadlift exercise
Change weight and number of sets for the overhead press exercise
Change weight increments for the squat exercise
Change weight increments for the bench press exercise
Change weight increments for the rowing exercise
Change weight increments for the deadlift exercise
Change weight increments for the ohp exercise
Long-press a thumbnail to add an image
Press a thumbnail to display at larger size
These are your current stats in the Stronglifts 5x5 program.\nClick the video button to view your latest form recordings.

This is where you log your workout. Click the checkboxes until you get a checkmark (for completed sets) or a cross (for failed sets). Click the Video button by any exercise to record your form in that exercise.

This is the homepage. You can access the functionality of Strongbird by swiping to a side, or by opening the menu. You can use the Camera button and Music button on any page to open your default camera (for taking progress pictures) or media player.
This is where you view statistics for your progress in Stronglifts 5x5. Click the video button to the right to view your last form recording in the exercise of your choice.
This is the gallery. Here you can see the progress pictures you have taken. Press a thumbnail to display the picture, or long-press it to add an image from your own collection.
